name: Armory & Machine 2 - Idle Soul
description:
A flickering light invades your line of sight. The Machine beckons. Will you accept its invitation?
...It’s like the Machine was made with your soul in mind…
...A new portal. A new clue. Travel yields knowledge. Knowledge pleases The Machine…
...A lesser Operator would have trouble controlling The Machine, even in idle. But not you…
Gather your wit. It’s time to begin.
There may be others who understand The Machine. There are places where Machinists gather to share information and speak with the creators:
